## Load data
```{r}
malaria_outbreak <- read_csv("data/malaria.csv")
malaria_outbreak
```

```{r}
malaria_long<- malaria_outbreak%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=starts_with("malaria_rdt"),
               names_to = "age_class",
               values_to = "cases")%>%
  select(newid, data_date, submitted_date, location_name, Province, District, age_class, cases)
```

```{r}
malaria_long%>%
  filter(data_date=="2020-07-30")%>%
  group_by(District)%>%
  summarise(tot_cases=sum(cases, ra.rm=T))%>%
  arrange(tot_cases)
```
